title: Sao House
description: Sao House aims to create a dynamic cultural hub that bridges traditional Vietnamese coffee culture with Salt Lake City's creative community, offering both a daily neighborhood gathering place and a destination for unique evening events and artistic experiences.
_imageNote: Images are auto-detected! Place webp files named: sao_1.webp (cover), sao_2.webp (gallery), etc.
metrics: Leading development of revolutionary creative retail location
Integrating cutting-edge AI and immersive technologies
Building comprehensive design system from ground up
Currently in active development with planned launch in early 2026
impact: Building the future of creative collaboration through innovative technology integration and human-centered design principles. This project aims to redefine how creative professionals work together in an increasingly digital world.
